column4: I am trying to use wine to start a game that irequires a command in the windows shortcut to the game ... in windows it is started by "dt.exe -nologin" .... How should I do this in wine? Is it ok with wine dt.exe -nologin ?
I'd recommend googling for others who've tried it... or check winehq

path has to be mapped to a drive accessible by wine as well; afaik (or rather, have heard) by default everything is but if you have changed the setup, it may be missing access to the directory as well
